alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:53AM CDT until July 11 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHERRY COUNTY... At 352 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Merriman, or 22 miles southeast of Martin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cody, Nenzel, Medicine Lake, Cody Lake, Eli, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River and Schoolhouse Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 139 and 168. Highway 61 between mile markers 217 and 219. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
